Text: Re AESHaywood SiteRevised SPA Amendment Cc Michael Ben Jacoby and I are still discussing the fundamental business terms reflected in this draft Speaking for AES we do not plan to execute as is We expect to speak again tonight Steve Hase Attached please find a revised Amendment No to the Securities Purchase Agreement reflecting the new business terms This revised amendment should supercede the version I distributed on Friday In order to expedite the review process I am simultaneously sending a copy of this document to ENA for their final approval therefore it remains subject to further changes if necessary Best regards Aaron P Roffwarg Bracewell Patterson LLP South Tower Pennzoil Place Louisiana St Houston Texas Ph Fax CONFIDENTIALITY STATEMENT This information is intended only for the use of the individual or entity to which it is addressed and may contain information that is privileged confidential andor exempt from disclosure under applicable law If you are not the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination of this information is strictly prohibited If you have received this information in error please notify us immediately by telephone at or by fax at and confirm that you have destroyed this information and any copies Thank you

Re AESHaywood SiteNew SPA and PDA Amendments Cc I am reviewing your draft amendment with Audrey We have serious concerns about the security note The form of the AES Corp guarantee providing security relating to the original agreements should be all thats required We have a few other comments too Would like to have a conference call for all interested parties as soon as possible to resolve this I suggest AM E Callin Access code Next alternative time would be PM ET Steve Hase
Re AESHaywood SiteNew SPA and PDA Amendments Cc I will execute and send back by fax Wed morning Who should I fax to for signature on Enrons side Steve Hase

Re AESHaywood Site SPA PDA and Guaranty Amendments Cc Your voicemail requesting a new corporate guarantee is making this transaction increasingly burdensome for us unsettling the balance I thought we had reached Call me tonight when you are out of your hearings In the meantime Ill review the docs svh

Re Revised SPA Signature Page Cc I am executing the signature pages of Amendment to SPA to PDA Assignment and sending to Audrey to hold until approval of final language and Friday Closing Also Notice of Waiver and Acknowledgement of Obligation to Pay Letter I will send to her by end of today Attached is the draft Acknowledgement letter Please advise if you suggest any changes Steve ACKNOWDOC

Re Revised SPA Signature PageHeres a new Commitment Letter attempting to incorporate the draft language of Section I just received I have signed this version and sent it on to Audrey to hold svh ACKNODOC

Assignors Obligations Due Dligenceand Aaron We note in the Assignment of Interest document sent yesterday there is a new section whereby AES would be assuming all of the obligations of Volunter Land Development Company We need to perform due diligence on what those obligations are and whether they have changed since the SPA was executed We need the following information for determining what obligations VLDC has incurred financial statements of the LLC What debts does the LLC owe and to whom list of all the agreements entered into by the company to my knowledge there is the system impact study agreemt with TVA Any other agreements with TVA like a Keep Whole letter copies of any new agreements not already delivered in the Binder dated Nov any tax agreements with the County or any other public entity any amendments to your land option agreements with Mann or English Id appreciate your review of these matters as soon as possible to keep our scheduled closing on track Ill be meeting with Ben at CT Our call remains at PM CT same as before Steve Hase
Re Closing Documents Cc final coordinating call set for AM CT Code I executed the rep and warrant certificate last night We are set for closing at AM today Steve Hase
